TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlNodeOrder extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the document order of a node compared to a second node.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder After = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The current node of this navigator is after the current node of the supplied navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder Before = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The current node of this navigator is before the current node of the supplied navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder Same = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The two navigators are positioned on the same node.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder Unknown = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The node positions cannot be determined in document order, relative to each other. This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.
